summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell, transmitting a supplemental discovery production in the case United States v. Maxwell (20 CR. 330). The email includes attachments of discovery documents and a cover letter, with plans to send a physical disc to the Metropolitan Detention Center.

events.title: Supplemental Discovery Production
events.description: The prosecution transmits supplemental discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team in her criminal case.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The prosecution in US v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 CR. 330) provided a supplemental discovery production to her defense counsel on December 16, 2020.
The discovery was transmitted via email with multiple PDF attachments and a cover letter, with a physical disc to be sent to the Metropolitan Detention Center.
The defense team included attorneys Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, Mark S. Cohen, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The correspondence indicates ongoing pre-trial discovery proceedings in Maxwell's criminal case.
The email originates from an Assistant United States Attorney at the Southern District of New York, based at 1 St. Andrew's Plaza.
